name: Granny Horror Hospital
description:
Your only chance to survive from the hospital with ghosts and granny is a flashlight.
You need to find a way to escape from this horror hospital of the dead.
You are sick and need to rest on the hospital, but this hospital is scary coz filled with ghost. All the patient have no other way to escape because the doctor itself is a scary ghost.
But be careful, don't get caught up by granny.
She can see everything!
